author: Not available
source: The Complete Corpus of Anglo-Saxon Poetry

text.0: Me lifes onlah      se þis leoht onwrah,
text.1: ond þæt torhte geteoh,      tillice onwrah.
text.2: Glæd wæs ic gliwum,      glenged hiwum,
text.4: Secgas mec segon,      symbel ne alegon,
text.8: þa wæs wæstmum aweaht,      world onspreht,
text.12: Scrifen scrad glad      þurh gescad in brad,
text.13: wæs on lagustreame lad,      þær me leoþu ne biglad.
text.14: Hæfde ic heanne had,      ne wæs me in healle gad,
text.15: þæt þær rof weord rad.      Oft þær rinc gebad,
text.16: þæt he in sele sæge      sincgewæge,
text.20: Swa mec hyhtgiefu heold,      hygedryht befeold,
text.22: swylce eorþe ol,      ahte ic ealdorstol,
text.24: ac wæs gefest gear,      gellende sner,
text.26: Scealcas wæron scearpe,      scyl wæs hearpe,
text.37: From ic wæs in frætwum,      freolic in geatwum;
text.38: wæs min dream dryhtlic,      drohtað hyhtlic.
text.39: Foldan ic freoþode,      folcum ic leoþode,
text.40: lif wæs min longe,      leodum in gemonge,
text.42: Nu min hreþer is hreoh,      heofsiþum sceoh,
text.43: nydbysgum neah;      gewiteð nihtes in fleah
text.44: se ær in dæge wæs dyre.      Scriþeð nu deop in feore
text.54: Dreamas swa her gedreosað,      dryhtscype gehreosað,
text.55: lif her men forleosað,      leahtras oft geceosað;
text.56: treowþrag is to trag,      seo untrume genag,
text.57: steapum eatole misþah,      ond eal stund genag.
text.58: Swa nu world wendeþ,      wyrde sendeþ,
text.69: Me þæt wyrd gewæf,      ond gewyrht forgeaf,
text.70: þæt ic grofe græf,      ond þæt grimme græf
text.71: flean flæsce ne mæg,      þonne flanhred dæg
text.73: seo me eðles ofonn      ond mec her eardes onconn.
text.74: þonne lichoma ligeð,      lima wyrm friteþ,
text.75: ac him wenne gewigeð      ond þa wist geþygeð,
text.77: ond æt nyhstan nan      nefne se neda tan
text.78: balawun her gehloten.      Ne biþ se hlisa adroren.
text.79: ær þæt eadig geþenceð,      he hine þe oftor swenceð,
text.80: byrgeð him þa bitran synne,      hogaþ to þære betran wynne,
text.81: gemon morþa lisse,      þær sindon miltsa blisse
text.82: hyhtlice in heofona rice.      Uton nu halgum gelice
text.85: þær moncyn mot      for meotude rot
text.86: soðne god geseon,      ond aa in sibbe gefean.
